what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-001: Insufficient Data Validation During Entry & Upload
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The platform lacks comprehensive validation checks during data entry and Excel uploads. Users can submit incomplete or invalid data without clear error messages.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Employee profile fields allow saving without all mandatory fields completed. No inline validation observed for MoL ID or Emirates ID fields during exploration.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-002: Incomplete Employee Profile Data Fields & Missing Lookup Tools
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The employee profile lacks several important data fields and lookup capabilities including incomplete city dropdown for Saudi Arabia and no dedicated job title field.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Work tab uses 'Title' field rather than a dedicated 'Job Title' field. No IBAN lookup tool visible. City selection limitations not testable without Saudi Arabia location.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-003: Limited Bulk Upload Template Coverage
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Bulk upload template does not support all critical employee attributes like job type and role management.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Download button visible on All Employees page but did not test bulk upload template contents to avoid modifying data.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-004: Frontend UI Rendering & Navigation Inconsistencies
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Multiple frontend rendering issues including health insurance policy dropdown, document import paging, and employee name link inconsistencies.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: No rendering issues observed during exploration. Pages loaded correctly with consistent navigation. React migration appears to have addressed some legacy Ember issues.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-005: Leave & Policy Management Workflow Gaps
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: No view dialog for policy documents within employee profile. Leave records invisible after policy unassignment.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Leaves tab visible on employee profile but did not test policy assignment/unassignment flows to avoid modifying data.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Platform constrained by officially recognized government locations. Cannot add project-based or emerging cities.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: This is by design. Work tab shows Legal Country of Residence and Residency Visa Issue Location dropdowns that use official government registries.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Cannot simultaneously delete an employee and their reporting manager due to transaction isolation conflicts.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Did not test concurrent deletion to avoid modifying test data. Work tab shows Reports to field, confirming reporting hierarchy exists.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-008: Backend API & Email Integration Limitations
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: No dedicated employee search API for minimal, role-based information. Cannot dynamically embed CSM contact in welcome emails.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Backend API limitations not testable through UI. Search functionality on All Employees page works for basic searches.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-009: Frontend Form State & Navigation Issues
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Inconsistent frontend state management. Fields data lost when invisible, Work tab triggers unexpected data change dialogs, Legal Country of Residence searchbox malfunction.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Navigated to Work tab without triggering unexpected data change dialogs during this session. Legal Country of Residence field appeared functional.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Document upload has UX gaps: unclear 5MB error, no delete for mistaken uploads, OCR auto-reclassification without confirmation, redundant upload sections.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Documents tab shows multiple upload sections: main dropzone, Insurance section dropzone, Dependents section dropzone. Document categories area has separate upload areas creating visual complexity. Complete drafts button shows 854 drafts suggesting document management overhead.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: No prevention of duplicate employee IDs during Excel imports. No clear handling of data discrepancies when assigning documents.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Did not test Excel import flow to avoid modifying data. Employee ID field visible on Work tab.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Document expiry reminder system in PHP needing migration. No automatic relationship maintenance when documents replaced.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Employee Documents page shows document expiry tracking by month (Mar: 0, Apr: 2, May: 0, Jun: 2). Expiry tracking is functional. Backend architecture limitations not UI-testable.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-013: Employee Record Field & Validation Gaps
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: No hire date change restrictions across modules. Work email changes allowed for registered users. No contract type field. No comprehensive employee search endpoint.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Work tab shows Hiring Date field editable without apparent restrictions. No 'Contract Type' field visible in Work tab (only Job Type: Full Time visible). Title field used in lieu of dedicated Job Title.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-014: Document Type & Dependent Document Controls
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: No mechanism to restrict document modifications based on insurance policy stage. System allows mentioning inactive employees in comments.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Documents tab shows document categories but did not test restriction behavior based on insurance stage. Dependents section visible with insurance controls.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: No sorting to prioritize unassigned employees. Profile completion status filtering restrictive. Excel export issues on View Team Page.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: All Employees page shows Filters button and Full profile Completion column. Sorting appears limited to column headers. Download button present but export constraints not tested.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Backend routing/auth constraints causing 404 errors. HR classes tightly coupled in core module. Employee Records lacks flexible data point tracking.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Navigation protocol requires clicking through UI rather than direct URL access, confirming routing constraints. Custom Data settings provide some flexibility for data point tracking but limited to predefined categories.

summary: Records Management v2 validation completed successfully. Explored 11 key navigation areas including All Employees (124 records), Employee Profile (12 tabs), Invitations, Company Assets (356 total), Company Documents, Employee Documents (164 docs, 854 drafts), Settings > Company (12 sections), Settings > Custom Data (3 categories), Workflows (18 configured), Approval Flows (44 types), and AI Reports. CRUD operations validated: create via Add Employee/Invite buttons, read via row click to profile, update via inline editing and Work tab fields, delete via trash icons and Actions menus. Workflow integration confirmed with 10 employee-related triggers and 10 actions. No dedicated Employee Records approval flow found, but related flows (Bank Account Update, Employee Grade Change, Onboarding Form) exist. Of 16 WOF items: 6 CONFIRMED, 5 NOT_REPRODUCIBLE, 3 SKIPPED, 2 CONFIRMED as by-design or partially confirmed. High-impact items (WOF-001, WOF-013) confirmed - validation gaps and field gaps persist.
